Hi all, I recently purchased this Momoyama Owari sukashi I have had my 
> e=
ye on for a while. Fairly classic design and at 81mm x 80mm x 5.5mm it

s a nice size. One of the traits here that I find most interesting is

e mimi, and the obvious fold line that appears in it (it covers about 
> 30=
% of the mimi). it is almost like the tsuba was made from a two plate

nstruction, though I am not suggesting that at all. I assume the 
> origina=
l plate was forged, then folded and forged again before shaping.

not nay that I have seen this so clearly before in an Owari guard

hting etc) and wondered if it was a normal trait in Owari works.
